page.title: 12I Like Great Broughton
page.content: I like living in{Gt. Broughton} because it is in the country and I have lots of friends. There is not much to do in form of entertainment during the holidays. However the hills are nearby so it is not difficult to go for a walk. My dad often goes down to play tennis at the sports club. I usually go when there is a tournament on because there is a good chance that other children will be there. In {Kirby}there is a church with lots of big trees growing round . There is an {old school}which is now being converted in to a house. Down {Kirby }road there is an old hall , this is the oldest building in the area. Busby is a small village. It has 12 houses and a telepone booth.
